title: Looks like they permabanned me because I couldn't give them the exact date the account was made on.
body:
This account is several years old. I doubt most people with a several years old account could tell them that. I guess this is what happens when you try to appeal your 14-day bans.

https://imgur.com/gallery/lX9V7bS

(shrug) They gave me the boot.{{sticker:cass-cry}}

I gave them credit card information, paypal addresses, the pin codes of RP cards I used on the account, email registration, the information of the other tickets I had submitted, etc, etc. But nope, couldn't tell them the exact date the account was made on. 

This can be verified by any Riot staff member that can see my tickets that i'm telling the truth.

replies.body:
>I gave them credit card information, paypal addresses, the pin codes of RP cards I used on the account

I've never heard of Riot asking for any of these things. Traditionally, they have asked for date of account creation, email used to create the account, first champion purchased (now defunct due to new functionality in the client), first skin purchase (also defunct), etc. That may have changed, however.

It's possible the account was locked due to suspicion of compromise. Regardless, the only avenue at this point is a new support ticket.

Good luck.

> [{quoted}](name=Ulanopo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:33:43.411+0000)
>
> I've never heard of Riot asking for any of these things. Traditionally, they have asked for date of account creation, email used to create the account, first champion purchased (now defunct due to new functionality in the client), first skin purchase (also defunct), etc. That may have changed, however.
> 
> It's possible the account was locked due to suspicion of compromise. Regardless, the only avenue at this point is a new support ticket.
> 
> Good luck.

They told me that I could not prove that the account was mine so they could not unlock it. They told me it was the end of the line for me. Asking about the first champions I purchased and the account is so old I couldn't possibly remember.
Try digging through your email. There should be an account creation email buried way back. I just found mine that's over 5 years old

> [{quoted}](name=LuluTopSionMid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:36:03.286+0000)
>
> They told me that I could not prove that the account was mine so they could not unlock it. They told me it was the end of the line for me. Asking about the first champions I purchased and the account is so old I couldn't possibly remember.

I'm really sorry to hear this, I definitely couldn't tell them when my account was first made if my account not being permabanned depended on it. :/ This is a really unfortunate example of the state in which we find the game. I really hope a member of Riot looks into this more closely for targeted abuse of powers.
If you don't want a moba. Because their moba flopped hard.
they ask for four last digit of credit card idk about paypal and also ask about rp card pins

> [{quoted}](name=need a namexD,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:43:49.756+0000)
>
> they ask for four last digit of credit card idk about paypal and also ask about rp card pins

Now they ask for the first 6 digits and the last 4 of credit cards.

i remember when support was so easy to scam that my 13 year old at the time older brother ''hacked'' one of his classmates account
now they just copy paste stuff and don't help you at all rofl

> [{quoted}](name=need a namexD,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0002000200000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:56:25.104+0000)
>

> now they just copy paste stuff and don't help you at all rofl

I've given them enough information sans a social security number to access a bank account, and even a bank account doesn't have to ask you for when it was created.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=yrc23zHg,discussion-id=4QvrVi5t,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-13T07:26:23.550+0000)
>
> Player Support will no longer disclose your account creation date, as it's one of the questions used for account recovery. The best way to determine your account creation date from your own records is to search your email for your registration confirmation email from Riot Games. Other than that, going off by which champion came out when you joined is likely the next closest thing.

[source](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/4QvrVi5t-anyway-to-see-lol-account-age)

Riot does not ask for such information, so you were subject to some sort of scam or operation and by connection you were probably banned.

Riot will never asked for your credit card information, paypal adress, or your riot pin codes as that's all private information. email registration and ticket submissions may be the only subjects they may ask about.

> [{quoted}](name=Azurify,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:10:17.619+0000)
>
> Riot does not ask for such information, so you were subject to some sort of scam or operation and by connection you were probably banned.
> 
> Riot will never asked for your credit card information, paypal adress, or your riot pin codes as that's all private information. email registration and ticket submissions may be the only subjects they may ask about.

Thats what it says in the little chat windows in game. This was from their support center. My account says it is now permanently banned. No reform card, just gone.

> [{quoted}](name=LuluTopSionMid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:12:11.027+0000)
>
> Thats what it says in the little chat windows in game. This was from their support center. My account says it is now permanently banned. No reform card, just gone.

This is equally troubling, disgusting, and disturbing if you were indeed banned because you were pointing out the flaws in the system and they'd rather sweep you under the rug. If you make trouble with Riot, you will be gotten rid of, got it, good to know, glad we found out here.

Not what happened. Likely OP tried to BS out of a just ban, and the escalation to perm was due to further investigation, or them taking offense at the BS.

Sensitive information related to an account is only ever requested for recovery purposes, it has jack shit to do with a ban appeal.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:21:47.544+0000)

> 
> Sensitive information related to an account is only ever requested for recovery purposes, it has jack shit to do with a ban appeal.

You can't possibly know what happened so you have no right to speculate. It was brought to the forums so that it could come to the attention of a Riot Staff.
Chances are OP bought the account.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:39:55.570+0000)
>
> Chances are OP bought the account.

And now we trade truths to be determined by Riot officials with baseless accusations from nobodies. How old is your account? Tell us the date it was made? If its not several years old and you cant give us the the exact date, you can remove yourself from the conversation pal.

OP hasn't posted any proof. 

Usually when someone has a ticket they'd like help with, they copy and paste it. Or take a screenshot. OP has done neither.

> [{quoted}](name=Scuttle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:51:37.881+0000)
>

> 
> Usually when someone has a ticket they'd like help with, they copy and paste it. Or take a screenshot. OP has done neither.

If i was told to lay out my credit card information I certainly wouldn't want to be posting screenshots of it... He is trying to get the attention of another riot staff to look into the matter.

There's no reason he can't block those out from an image in Paint or remove them from the paste.

I've had Riot ask for my account info before. They do it for any account changes such as removing champions. They asked for the date my account was made. I knew which login screen was on when I made it, so I just told them the month/year that was in.

But keep defending OP when he has provided absolutely nothing to prove this actually happened. Pretty sure he's just trying to provoke a response from the people on this board.

> [{quoted}](name=Scuttle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000200000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:55:58.375+0000)

>

> 
> But keep defending OP when he has provided absolutely nothing to prove this actually happened. Pretty sure he's just trying to provoke a response from the people on this board.

Lets just keep in mind that OP isn't here to prove anything to you, just to get the attention of a Riot member to look into the situation as the forums have always been the "last chance" saloon for many of these players. RiotTantram posted in elsewhere in here in the last day because he seems to care about the trouble of other players (or at least putting liars in their place). It would be easier if players would stop downvoting probably, but eh (shrug).

>

Please don't make baseless accusations as it obfuscates from the conversation at hand. I leveled this account to 30 myself.

Then prove that in the support ticket. 

You can tell them that you don't remember, but can give them an approximate time of when the account was created  and the 3 champs that you may have first purchased. 

Then ask then if they can ask you any other question to verify the account. 

The boards can't do anything to help you. Even if a rioter does stumble upon this thread, they would still need you to verify your ownership of the account.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:06:09.349+0000)

>

Sounds like they've tried very hard to prove it, with extremely legitimate sources. Or are you just down voting and not reading?

I can get access to an account, buy rp, not play, get locked out 3 months later and claim I'm the rightful owner of the account with that rp purchase info.

Not a secure enough way to verify ownership.

First listed email is one secure info, but if I hacked the account, chances are I would have that information already. 

So they would need another piece of info to verify the ownership.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:14:32.153+0000)

>

> 
> So they would need another piece of info to verify the ownership.

Like credit card information, paypal accounts, registered emails, receipt of purchases, etc?

Purchase history show up on the client, so it's easy to bring up that info if you've hacked into an account.

He needs to use stuff that aren't shown in the client and only the owner knows about.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:14:32.153+0000)

I also shared with them skins i've been gifted, the skins i've gifted, and the name of a Riot staff who rewarded me with RP for witnessing my gameplay and interaction with other players, as well as the varying Riot members I have on my friends list, along with the IP addresses i've played the game on most consistently (i've played away from home a time or two), and different transaction verification id numbers from RP cards used and credit cards used.

> [{quoted}](name=WhoIsThisDude,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=000200000002,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:20:04.668+0000)
>
> Try digging through your email. There should be an account creation email buried way back. I just found mine that's over 5 years old

I'd like to, but I couldn't remember my old email and had no recovery option for it, so I couldn't get inside it. Hotmail also deactivates accounts that haven't been used in so long and deletes old emails and other information inside them.

Then do you remember which champ was just released or the log in screen when you created you account? That would give you an approximate time of creation.

 Then tell them your first 3 purchased champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-05-05T01:31:32.906+0000)
>

> 
>  Then tell them your first 3 purchased champs.

This is a very old account that I started a while back, walked away from because of work and school, then started back up again. They asked for the first 5 champions I purchased. I can't even remember the first two. (shrug) I just want someone like Riot Tantram to look into it because i've seen that he's someone who looks into things is all based on the posts i've seen of his in this section. If my credit card information, credit card receipts, gift history and gifting history, and telling them the name of a Riot staff who gifted me RP isn't good enough, and the only way to prove it is my account is by using information from an email i dont have and cant get into anymore? Well. Shucks.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

If MagicFlyingLlama has no right to speculate about the possibility of the OP trying to weasel out of a just ban and getting an escalation, then, honestly, you don't have the right to speculate about Riot "permabanning someone for pointing out 'flaws' in the system".

Frankly, both possibilities sound unlikely. OP's 14-day ban may have been just, but, I don't think that appealing it would have led to an escalated punishment (unless they were particularly irritable about it), and it's horribly unlikely that OP was trying to point out some "crippling flaw" and Riot decided to shut him down in the hopes that that "flaw" wouldn't come to light.

What I think happened is as follows: OP gets a valid 14-day ban for bad behavior, OP sends support ticket, Support Agent feels that the OP's account may have been compromised (and the person who may/may not have jacked the account was the one who earned the 14-day), and so the Support Agent placed a shield ban on OP's account.

To me, that just kinda makes the most sense.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:21:47.544+0000)
>
> Not what happened. Likely OP tried to BS out of a just ban, and the escalation to perm was due to further investigation, or them taking offense at the BS.
> 
> Sensitive information related to an account is only ever requested for recovery purposes, it has jack shit to do with a ban appeal.

Thats the thing though. I was appealing to them to remove the 14-day and all of a sudden "we've detected strange activity on your account, we're placing it under a permanent ban until you can lift it by giving us this information" and that was that. 

No in between, straight line. This can be verified by any other Riot member as well.

> [{quoted}](name=LuluTopSionMid,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=fyhhg7iE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-05T00:12:11.027+0000)
>
> Thats what it says in the little chat windows in game. This was from their support center. My account says it is now permanently banned. No reform card, just gone.

You got scammed the person you were talking to was NOT riot... They dont do that stuff in client chat.  Your account has been locked due to you giving all the info neccessary to a scammer to take it from you and riot detecting that.

They do, but only for recovering a stolen account.

OP absolutely did not get this unless they tried some bullshit to argue their account was stolen.

And they would not escalate a ban for that, most likely they just called the bullshit.

Wow, Riot completely screw you.

Call them out on their broken system bullshit and they put in you a position you cant fight to be permabanned. FFS what BULLSHIT.
